name: Chanel No. 5
description: A timeless classic fragrance with floral and woody notes, perfect for any occasion.

name: Dior Sauvage
description: A bold and invigorating fragrance with spicy and woody notes, perfect for modern men.

name: Tom Ford Black Orchid
description: A luxurious and sensual fragrance with rich floral and oriental notes.

name: Jo Malone London Peony & Blush Suede
description: A delicate and elegant fragrance featuring peony and blush suede, perfect for light, everyday wear.

name: Yves Saint Laurent Black Opium
description: A warm and seductive fragrance with coffee, vanilla, and floral notes, perfect for evening wear.

name: Giorgio Armani Si
description: A sophisticated and elegant fragrance with notes of blackcurrant, vanilla, and patchouli.

name: Viktor & Rolf Flowerbomb
description: A rich floral fragrance that blends jasmine, orange flower, and patchouli.

name: Hermes Terre d'Hermes
description: A woody, earthy fragrance with notes of orange, pepper, and oakmoss.

name: Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue
description: A fresh and fruity fragrance with notes of Sicilian lemon, apple, and cedarwood.

name: Marc Jacobs Daisy
description: A fresh and feminine fragrance with notes of wild strawberry, violet leaves, and jasmine.

name: Chloé Eau de Parfum
description: A modern floral fragrance with notes of peony, rose, and cedarwood.

name: Prada Candy
description: A sweet and sensual fragrance with notes of caramel, vanilla, and musk.

name: Givenchy L'Interdit
description: A bold and rebellious fragrance with notes of tuberose, orange blossom, and patchouli.

name: Bvlgari Omnia Crystalline
description: A fresh, fruity fragrance with notes of bamboo, pear, and lotus flower.

name: Acqua di Parma Colonia
description: A refined and elegant fragrance with citrus, lavender, and vetiver notes.
